channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Passing the Big, Beautiful Bill
item.description: Republicans need to be willing to say ‘no’ to the moderates in the caucus.

item.title: Trump’s Tariffs Are A Global War On Slave Labor
item.description: Trump didn’t wait for approval from Ivy League economists to act on what should be common sense: You don’t compete with slave labor, you crush it.

item.title: No-Fault: The Latest Divorce Memoir Not Worth Your Read

item.title: Rich D.C. Colleges Don’t Deserve Taxpayer Giveaways
